Field.name: ConfigurationTypeCode
Field.comment: Code defining how information is being grouped or arrayed

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: XPeg
Field.comment: Horizontal distance from the edge to the center of the peg hole (measured from the left)

Field.name: YPeg
Field.comment: The vertical distance from the edge to the center of the peg hole as specified by the peg code
